subject: A few EVPMR files posted
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
--0-488115819-1207336747=:48803
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

After redoing everything I was doing, and with a lot a help from the group, I think I actually hear a few things from my latest three minute evpmaker session.  I have posted in my files at Ronriko.  In one file I clearly hear the name R LEDERER.  It is unmistaken because most of my family can't even pronounce my last name correctly (but not the German pronunciation).    What is also interesting is the name came after I asked who is there to speak to me and before I asked them to say my name.  I do have at least two relatives on the other side with the same first initial as mine.  Interesting that they said R and not Ron.  This answer was heard a little more than half way into the file but I have posted more hoping someone hears more and can let me know.  That goes with the other files I have posted.  
   
  One other file posted, I hear ....I WILL SAVE....but I cannot make out what comes before or after.  Two other files have no messages but I am hoping someone will listen and comment.  
  It's great to get something I can hear but I am certain I am missing tooooo much.  It's a start.   Thanks Bruce, Stefan and Margaret.   Ron L

       
---------------------------------
You rock. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster Total Access, No Cost.
